actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that certified public accountants and enrolled agents may represent taxpayers in certain Tax Court cases involving $10,000 or less.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow certified public accountants and enrolled agents authorized to practice before the Internal Revenue Service to represent taxpayers in certain Tax Court cases involving $10,000 or less.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that certified public accountants and enrolled agents may represent taxpayers in certain Tax Court cases involving $10,000 or less.
